item.title: ALL COVERS
item.description: Selection Mr DAY - IVAN Funkey Monkey - JAMES TAYLOR C - SIEGFRIED Wilmer and the Dukes - I'm free - Harmless Aretha Franklin - Satisfaction - atlantic james knight and the butlers - save me - souljazz Dieter zimmermann - whole lotta love Think about it - Skorpions of Jamaica The supremes - Come together Isley BrOthers - Love The One You With - t neck the buddy richards big band - the beat goes on April march - chick habit the butch cassidy soundsystem - cissy strut this kid named miles - ring of fire - bastard boots - nuff man live fi jah city Sly johnson - is it because I'm black the delphonics - the look of love - emi Brian Auger and Julie Driscoll - Season Of The Witch - Atco musicawa silt - nostalgia 77 octet look-ka py py - the bacao rhythm and steel band Eir deodato - black dog the feelies - everybody's get something to hide except me and my monkey apache - byron lee and the dragonaires the marketts - the batman theme - wb The Jam - In the Midnight Hour - polydor The Dells - Sittin on the dock of the bay - cadet The Clash - Police and Thieves - CBS The Dynamics - 90 % of Me Is You - Big Single The Free Design - Light my fire
item.dc:creator: la spirale Mr Day

Selection Mr DAY - IVAN Funkey Monkey - JAMES TAYLOR C - SIEGFRIED
Wilmer and the Dukes - I'm free - Harmless Aretha Franklin - Satisfaction - atlantic james knight and the butlers - save me - souljazz Dieter zimmermann - whole lotta love Think about it - Skorpions of Jamaica The supremes - Come together Isley BrOthers - Love The One You With - t neck the buddy richards big band - the beat goes on April march - chick habit the butch cassidy soundsystem - cissy strut this kid named miles - ring of fire - bastard boots - nuff man live fi jah city Sly johnson - is it because I'm black the delphonics - the look of love - emi Brian Auger and Julie Driscoll - Season Of The Witch - Atco musicawa silt - nostalgia 77 octet look-ka py py - the bacao rhythm and steel band Eir deodato - black dog the feelies - everybody's get something to hide except me and my monkey apache - byron lee and the dragonaires the marketts - the batman theme - wb The Jam - In the Midnight Hour - polydor The Dells - Sittin on the dock of the bay - cadet The Clash - Police and Thieves - CBS The Dynamics - 90 % of Me Is You - Big Single The Free Design - Light my fire

item.title: you're welcome stop on by
item.description: Selection : Mr Day, Siegfried Marque east - patchworks remix the rongetz foundation harold alexander - clean up Martin medeski and Wood - latin shuffle - blue note Merryweather & Carrey -if i were you grand funk railroad - nothings the same poison chang - press the trigger Dal Gren - Down - Favorite Jenifer Lara - ain't no love - studio one brixton cat - reggae on the shore Jenifer Lara - Rocking tonigt - studio one alton ellis - it's a shame the impression - old before my time lorez alexandra - baltimore oriole jackie wilson - i get the sweetest feeling ZZ Hill - what more Town - You've got me turned around Tom Jones - puppet man Mr Day - Get It On - Favorite promo wickie andeson - you're welcome, stop on by Tyrone Davis - Ever lovin Girl - dakar t model ford - talkin'it - remix pharoah sanders - love will find a way
item.dc:creator: la spirale Mr Day
item.itunes:summary:
Selection : Mr Day, Siegfried Marque
east - patchworks remix the rongetz foundation harold alexander - clean up Martin medeski and Wood - latin shuffle - blue note Merryweather & Carrey -if i were you grand funk railroad - nothings the same poison chang - press the trigger Dal Gren - Down - Favorite Jenifer Lara - ain't no love - studio one brixton cat - reggae on the shore Jenifer Lara - Rocking tonigt - studio one alton ellis - it's a shame the impression - old before my time lorez alexandra - baltimore oriole jackie wilson - i get the sweetest feeling ZZ Hill - what more Town - You've got me turned around Tom Jones - puppet man Mr Day - Get It On - Favorite promo wickie andeson - you're welcome, stop on by Tyrone Davis - Ever lovin Girl - dakar t model ford - talkin'it - remix pharoah sanders - love will find a way

item.title: STEPPING STONES
item.description: JOIN THE SOULCIALIST PARTY - NEXT PARTY - THE CAVERN - LYON - 21 mars - 22h00 DJ'S IRISH PAUL - SAPERLIPOPETTE (Magic Potion Club - Lyon) - DYNAMIC JULIAN (Million Tears Soul Club- Lyon) - ANNC (tighten up 69 - Roma) La spirale selection by MR DAY & SIEGFRIED Deodato - funk yourself bob and gene - your name james reeze - jody's freeze johnny harris - stepping stones patti labelle - dan swit me The Heavy - that kind of man kalayanji anandji - chakra khan Taggy Matcher - Shimmy Shimmy Ya - Stix ambros seelos - mabusso el michels affair - yenicita - truth and soul jackie day - before it's too late Brian Auger & Julie Driscoll - I got life - the undisputed truth - earthquake shake AIFF - Watergirls - Unique Defunkt - In the good times el michels affair - Ocho rios - truth and soul mulatu astatke - asmarina jackson five - ABC Rico and the rudies - i'm your puppet mudy waters - I just want to make love to you Karen Dalton - Are you going to the country the moody blues - thank you baby The Free Design - Kites are fun deodato - first cuckoo roland alphonso - pussy cat ska tom waits - heartattack and wine Stormy - I won't stop to cry curtis mayfield - mother's son mel britt - she'll come running back the commodores - hold on lenny williams - shoo doo fu ooh ! Claudine myers - have mercy upon us
item.dc:creator: la spirale Mr Day
item.itunes:summary:
